text: Antonio "Tony" Binarelli (16 September 1940 â€“ 12 July 2022) was an Italian magician. He was honored with the Order of Merit of the Italian Republic. Binarelli died on 12 July 2022 at a hospital in Rome, at the age of 81. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1940 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Magicians Category:Italian television personalities Category:Entertainers from Rome
title: Tony Binarelli
